properties.title: Apache Standard Taglib: JSP[tm] Standard Tag Library (JSTL 1.0/1.1) implementation

section.name: Standard Taglib
section.p: Apache hosts the Apache Standard Taglib, an implementation of the JSP Standard Tag Library (JSTL) specification.
Currently available are implementations of the 1.0 and 1.1 versions of the specification:

ul.li: Standard-1.1 (JSTL 1.1) requires a JSP container that supports the Java Servlet 2.4 and JavaServer Pages 2.0 specifications. Jakarta Tomcat 5 supports the new specifications.
Standard-1.0 (JSTL 1.0) requires a JSP container that supports the Java Servlet 2.3 and JavaServer Pages 1.2 specifications. Jakarta Tomcat 4 supports these specifications.

tr.td: Moved to a Maven based build system.
A patch from Robert Goff has moved the trunk of the Standard Taglib up towards JSTL 1.2 level.
Standard Taglib version 1.1.2 - A minor bug fix update - is now available.
Standard Taglib version 1.1.1 released - A minor bug fix update - is now available.
Standard Taglib version 1.1.0 - First official release of our implementation of JSTL 1.1 - is now available.
Standard Taglib version 1.1.0-B1 - early access (Beta 1) of our implementation of JSTL 1.1 - is now available.

section.name: JSTL Books
section.p: The following books about JSTL are available:

ul.li: JSTL in Action, Shawn Bayern, Manning
Core JSTL: Mastering the JSP Standard Tag Library, David Geary, Sun Microsystems Press
